title: coin-score.ai
author: coin-score.ai
content: The projects I refer to are Game for a living and Hello Labs.Hello Labs has a market cap of 38 million and Game for a living 27 million.We have fundamentally analyzed both projects:Games for a LivingGeneral Score: 6.13/10https://coin-score.ai/cryptoprojects/fundamental-analysis-of-the-games-for-a-living-cryptocurrency/Subcriterias:SOCIAL & MASS MEDIA: 5.3/10AUDIT & SECURITY: 7.35/10TOKENOMICS: 4.73/10ECOSYSTEM DEVELOPMENT: 5.8/10TEAM & DEVELOPERS: 8.36/10PRODUCT & UTILITY: 7/10PARTNERS & INVESTORS: 5/10HELLO LabsGeneral Score: 6.47/10https://coin-score.ai/cryptoprojects/fundamental-analysis-of-the-hello-labs-hello-cryptocurrency/Subcriterias:SOCIAL & MASS MEDIA: 6/10AUDIT & SECURITY: 6.9/10TOKENOMICS: 7.65/10ECOSYSTEM DEVELOPMENT: 5.2/10TEAM & DEVELOPERS: 7/10PRODUCT & UTILITY: 6.8/10PARTNERS & INVESTORS: 6.3/10https://coin-score.ai/articles/crypto-projects-with-potential-in-the-gaming-sector/

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: I wouldn't like say this to you sincerely speaking this is my first time of hearing about this two project and i was like immediately i clicked on the link you provided it took me to project details but when i compared your website it doesn't give real data and is not reflecting with the one on cmc. On cmc the price is $.027 while your websites says $.030 and there is a slight difference with 0.003 and again try to work on the price of btc seems very low in your website than cmc.

comments.author: JunkieMiner
comments.body: Hello Labs has a price of 0.06 with a Marketcap of 33,350,430 having a great volume recently. As you know gaming projects in now a days are liked by more users than other projects, people mostly like to invest in gaming projects, so it has also have a decent volume. Also, it is listed on the best exchanges, but there is a slight difference between the price, as its highest-ever price was 0.07755. It would be great to invest in the gaming project nowadays, as it is worth it. I'm also waiting for the bull market, after that should look at these two projects, as they have a decent volume.
